item.title: RudyMQ- A Rudimentary Message Queue for Windows
item.description: For some odd reason out of the blue, I got this hankering to build a message queue (albeit rudimentary - hence the name) from scratch. I’ve been working with MSMQ for a while now, mostly as a transport for WCF. As cool as it is, it can really get on your nerves at times. It is an enterprise grade product, after all, which means there are a lot of dials you can turn.
